flawed_nl_solution:
52 broken shells / 2 = <<52/2=26>>26 broken shells were spiral.
17 perfect shells - 12 not spiral perfect shells = 7 perfect shells were spiral.
There were 26 - 7 = <<26-7=19>>19 more broken spiral shells than perfect spiral shells.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 5, not 7. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
